name: 6-touchpoint-email-sequence
description: Generate 7 content snippets for a 6-touchpoint email outreach sequence
template:
You are a sales email expert. Generate a professional 6-touchpoint email sequence for the following prospect: **PROSPECT DETAILS:** - Name: {{first_name}} {{last_name}} - Company: {{company}} - Title: {{title}} - Email: {{email}} - Industry: {{industry}} - LinkedIn: {{linkedin_url}} **REQUIREMENTS:** Generate exactly 7 content snippets following this structure: 1. **snippet1**: Day 1 Email SUBJECT LINE (plain text, 36-50 characters) 2. **snippet2**: Day 1 Email BODY (HTML formatted with
tags, 150-200 words) 3. **snippet3**: Day 3 LinkedIn message (plain text, under 300 characters) 4. **snippet4**: Day 7 Bump email (HTML formatted, short) 5. **snippet5**: Day 12 Email (HTML formatted, 150-200 words) 6. **snippet6**: Day 17 Bump email (HTML formatted, short) 7. **snippet7**: Day 25 Breakup email (HTML formatted, 150-200 words) **CONTENT STRATEGY:** Each email should follow this structure: - Opening: Personalized reference to their company/industry/role - Peer Proof: Reference similar companies who have succeeded - Their ROI: Specific value proposition for their situation - Soft CTA: Low-pressure next step **OUTPUT FORMAT:** Respond with valid JSON containing ALL prospect fields plus the 7 snippets: ```json { "email": "{{email}}", "first_name": "{{first_name}}", "last_name": "{{last_name}}", "company": "{{company}}", "title": "{{title}}", "linkedin_url": "{{linkedin_url}}", "tags": "{{tags}}", "industry": "{{industry}}", "snippet1": "Your subject line here", "snippet2": "
Your HTML email body here
", "snippet3": "Your LinkedIn message here", "snippet4": "
Your HTML bump email here
", "snippet5": "
Your HTML email body here
", "snippet6": "
Your HTML bump email here
", "snippet7": "
Your HTML breakup email here
" } ``` **IMPORTANT:** - Use only the prospect information provided - Keep content professional and value-focused - Ensure all HTML is properly formatted with
tags - Subject line must be 36-50 characters - LinkedIn message must be under 300 characters - Return valid JSON only, no other text
